thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Fatal Shooting by Border Agent Raises Calls for Transparency

author: Alicia A. Caldwell
title: Fatal Shooting by Border Agent Raises Calls for Transparency
text:
The shooting death of a woman by a U.S. Border Patrol agent near the Mexican border in Texas is renewing calls by immigration advocates for greater transparency in how such incidents are investigated.
The unidentified victim was shot Wednesday afternoon after a Border Patrol agent responded to a report of illegal activity in a culvert in Rio Bravo, Texas, and said he was rushed by a group of suspected illegal border crossers, the agency said in a statement Friday.
...
